verses.verse: There was a man<WH376> of the hill<WH2022> country of Ephraim,<WH669> whose name<WH8034> was Micah.<WH4321>

He said<WH559> to his mother,<WH517> "The eleven hundred<WH505> pieces of silver<WH3701> that were taken<WH3947> from you,<WH422> about which you uttered a curse, and also spoke<WH559> it in my ears,<WH241> behold,<WH3701> the silver is with me;<WH3947> I took it.<WH517>" His mother said,<WH559> "Blessed<WH1288> be my son<WH1121> of Yahweh.<WH3068>"

He restored<WH7725> the eleven hundred<WH505> pieces of silver<WH3701> to his mother;<WH517> and his mother<WH517> said,<WH559> "I most certainly<WH6942> dedicate<WH6942> the silver<WH3701> to Yahweh<WH3068> from my hand<WH3027> for my son,<WH1121> to make<WH6213> an engraved image<WH6459> and a molten image.<WH6459> Now therefore I will restore it to you.<WH7725>"

When he restored<WH7725> the money<WH3701> to his mother,<WH517> his mother<WH517> took<WH3947> two hundred<WH3967> pieces of silver,<WH3701> and gave<WH5414> them to the founder,<WH6884> who made<WH6213> of it an engraved image<WH6459> and a molten image:<WH4541> and it was in the house<WH1004> of Micah.<WH4321>

The man<WH376> Micah<WH4318> had a house<WH1004> of gods,<WH430> and he made<WH6213> an ephod,<WH646> and teraphim,<WH8655> and consecrated<WH4390> one<WH259> of his sons,<WH1121> who became his priest.<WH3548>
In those days<WH3117> there was no king<WH4428> in Israel:<WH3478> every man<WH376> did<WH6213> that which was right<WH3477> in his own eyes.<WH5869>
There was a young man<WH5288> out of Bethlehem Judah,<WH1035> of the family<WH4940> of Judah,<WH3063> who was a Levite;<WH3881> and he lived there.<WH1481>

The man<WH376> departed<WH3212> out of the city,<WH5892> out of Bethlehem Judah,<WH1035> to live<WH1481> where he could find<WH4672> a place,<WH935> and he came to the hill<WH2022> country of Ephraim<WH669> to the house<WH1004> of Micah,<WH4318> as he traveled.<WH6213>

Micah<WH4318> said<WH559> to him,<WH370> "Where did you come<WH935> from?<WH559>" He said to him,<WH3881> "I am a Levite of Bethlehem Judah,<WH1035> and I am looking<WH4672> for a place<WH1980> to live.<WH1481>"

Micah<WH4318> said<WH559> to him,<WH3427> "Dwell with me,<WH1> and be to me a father and a priest,<WH3548> and I will give<WH5414> you ten<WH6235> pieces of silver<WH3701> per year,<WH3117> a suit<WH6187> of clothing,<WH899> and your food.<WH4241>" So the Levite<WH3881> went in.<WH3212>
The Levite<WH3881> was content<WH2974> to dwell<WH3427> with the man;<WH376> and the young man<WH376> was to him as one<WH5288> of his sons.<WH1121>
Micah<WH4318> consecrated<WH4390> the Levite,<WH3881> and the young man<WH5288> became his priest,<WH3548> and was in the house<WH1004> of Micah.<WH4318>
Then Micah<WH4318> said,<WH559> "Now know<WH3045> I that Yahweh<WH3068> will do good<WH3190> to me,<WH3881> since I have a Levite to my priest.<WH3548>"
